subject: Cruelty to Animals
Casinos
Dogs
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Al and Paul Van Heuvel convene one day a week at the Derby Lane greyhound track in St. Petersburg, Fla., to have some laughs, drink beer out of paper cups and bet on the dogs.
